meanings.definition: Appointed or authorized to act on behalf of someone else.
meanings.sent1: The deputed team leader made sure everyone followed the rules.
meanings.sent2: The deputed spokesperson addressed the crowd on behalf of the organization.
meanings.sent3: The deputed driver accidentally took the wrong turn and ended up in a funny situation.
meanings.sent4: The deputed captain steered the ship through the storm with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The deputed guardian protected the castle with fierce loyalty.

meanings.sent1: She deputed him to deliver the important package to the client.
meanings.sent2: The manager deputed the new employee to handle customer inquiries.
meanings.sent3: The teacher deputed the students to create a fun project for the class.
meanings.sent4: The coach deputed the star player to score the winning goal in the match.
meanings.sent5: The chef deputed the sous chef to prepare the special dish for the event.

meanings.definition: Sent as a representative or delegate.
meanings.sent1: The deputed diplomat attended the peace talks on behalf of the country.
meanings.sent2: The deputed envoy carried the important message to the neighboring kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The deputed ambassador accidentally spilled coffee on the foreign dignitary.
meanings.sent4: The deputed representative eloquently presented the proposal to the council.
meanings.sent5: The deputed delegate forged strong alliances with other nations during the summit.
